# Kinga Dow

> Kinga Dow is an AI-powered retention marketing agency for e-commerce brands. Founded by Kinga Dow, the agency combines 8+ years of Klaviyo expertise with intelligent automation to build retention systems that turn browsers into repeat buyers. Based in Philadelphia, PA and Paris, France.

## About

Kinga Dow founded her first website development agency in 2001. By 2017, she found her niche in email marketing, specializing in Klaviyo — a behavioral email platform for e-commerce. Today, the agency delivers full-service retention marketing powered by AI, including email, SMS, WhatsApp campaigns, RFM segmentation, predictive analytics, and monthly optimization.

- Client retention rate: 3+ years average
- 20+ years of e-commerce experience
- Klaviyo Certified Partner

## Services

- [Services Overview](https://www.kingadow.com/services/): Full-service Klaviyo retention marketing — email, SMS, WhatsApp, loyalty programs, RFM segmentation, predictive analytics, and AI-powered flow optimization.
- [AI Strategy Consultation](https://www.kingadow.com/consultation/): 1-on-1 paid AI strategy sessions with Kinga for e-commerce brands looking to integrate AI into their retention marketing.
- [Retention Maturity Calculator](https://www.kingadow.com/calculator/): Free interactive tool to assess your e-commerce brand's retention marketing maturity level.
